annotations.description: What a thrilling encounter, there was plenty of goal mouth action. The hosts looked more lively and played better football. It was obvious that the hosts tried to outplay their opponents with some passing football, while the visitors focused on counter attacking play.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just finished.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's a goal! Henrikh Mkhitaryan plays a lovely pass into the box and finds Adrian Ramos (Dortmund). He tries his luck from close range and coolly strikes the ball into the back of the net. 3:1.

Fabian Lustenberger (Hertha Berlin) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. Guido Winkmann blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion. There is a free kick near the sideline to Dortmund.
The linesman signals that Adrian Ramos (Dortmund) is offside and the referee confirms the decision.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 4 min. of added time.
Adrian Ramos (Dortmund) fails to beat the offside trap and the linesman puts his flag up.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 80500.
Sebastian Langkamp (Hertha Berlin) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Sebastian Langkamp (Hertha Berlin) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
Adrian Ramos (Dortmund) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a precise pass. He pulls the trigger but only hits one of the opposition, who gets in the way of his effort.
CHANCE! Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) picks up a pass inside the box and has a sight of goal, but he blazes his shot well over the top.
Vladimir Darida (Hertha Berlin) takes the free kick and sends the ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready.
A player from Dortmund brings down an opponent and commits a foul. That's a free kick to Hertha Berlin.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jonas Hofmann (Dortmund) takes the corner, but it's intercepted by the defender.

Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders. The ball goes out for a corner. Dortmund can continue in their attacking effort.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Thomas Tuchel prepares a substitution. Marco Reus is replaced by Lukasz Piszczek (Dortmund).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Adrian Ramos (Dortmund) in, Ilkay Gundogan out.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Salomon Kalou (Hertha Berlin) is quickest to react to the rebound and stabs the ball into the back of the net. It's 2:1.
Vladimir Darida (Hertha Berlin) latches on to a precise pass and finds himself one on one with the keeper, but his effort is straight at Roman Burki, who is alert and makes an easy save to deny him.
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) tries to find the head of a teammate in the box but overhits the cross.
What a big chance! Marco Reus (Dortmund) picks up an inch perfect pass inside the box and fires the ball a whisker wide of the right post.
Salomon Kalou (Hertha Berlin) delivers a low pass into the box which is intercepted.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Salomon Kalou (Hertha Berlin) rolls the ball short to a teammate from the corner instead of sending a cross into the box.

John Brooks (Hertha Berlin) attempts to find the head of one of his teammates with a promising cross into the box, but a defender outjumps the attackers and averts the threat. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Hertha Berlin.
CLOSE! Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) shows off his amazing skills with a solo run to the edge of the box before fashioning a shot that goes inches wide of the left post!

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Pal Dardai has decided to make a change. Salomon Kalou (Hertha Berlin) replaces Johannes van den Bergh.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Jonas Hofmann (Dortmund) replaces Pierre Emerick Aubameyang.
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) breaks past challenges inside the box, but puts too much pace on his pass to Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) picks up a long through ball, but Thomas Kraft deserves praise for a brilliant reaction and interception.

Fabian Lustenberger (Hertha Berlin) outjumped the defenders to meet the ball from the free kick and plants a precise header from deep inside the box towards the net! The goalkeeper shows his reflexes and superbly keeps the ball out!
Vladimir Darida (Hertha Berlin) takes the ball and sets it for the free kick.
A clumsy foul by Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) and Guido Winkmann blows his whistle. Hertha Berlin earn a free kick.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) makes a rough challenge and the referee blows for a foul.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) sends a lofted cross into the box from the free kick, but Thomas Kraft guesses his intention and plucks the ball out of the air.

Vladimir Darida (Hertha Berlin) trips an opponent with a slide tackle. Guido Winkmann stops the game and he could give him a card, but eventually decides on just a warning. Dortmund will take a free kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Marco Reus (Dortmund) is hurriedly cleared.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Per Skjelbred makes way for Alexander Baumjohann (Hertha Berlin).
An attempted cross from Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) is cleared. Dortmund force a corner. They send men into the box.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) received a pass and didn't think long what to do with it. He fired a powerful long range shot which went painfully close to the bar.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) creates a good chance for himself and goes for goal from mid range, but he misses the left post by a whisker.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Matthias Ginter feeds Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund), who taps the ball into an empty net. He makes it 2:0.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Mitchell Weiser (Hertha Berlin) fouls his opponent and receives a yellow card from the referee, but he is clearly not happy with the decision.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) makes a rough challenge and Guido Winkmann blows his whistle for a foul.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: There will be a change on the pitch for the second half. Pal Dardai probably wasn't satisfied with the performance of Valentin Stocker. He is replaced by Mitchell Weiser (Hertha Berlin).

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The players are back out on the pitch following the half time break and the second half is about to start.

The opening 45 minutes weren't very eventful and the game could be described as an average one. The home side dominated the first half in most aspects of the game, but the visitors will surely attempt to turn the situation around in the second half. The home side have dominated the possession and midfield so far. The visitors have spent most of their time defending and waiting for the right moment to launch counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half of today's match has just finished.
Pierre Emerick Aubameyang (Dortmund) commits a foul after unfairly battling his opponent for the ball.
Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) wastes a great chance as he climbs high around the penalty spot to connect with a cross from the resulting free kick. He produces a header which goes well over the bar.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) is going to send the ball in from the free kick.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 additional min. will be played.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Guido Winkmann shows the yellow card to Johannes van den Bergh (Hertha Berlin) for a heavy challenge. Dortmund are awarded a free kick.
Marvin Plattenhardt (Hertha Berlin) whips the ball into the penalty area, but one of the defenders is alert and spanks it away.
Marco Reus (Dortmund) sends a nice lofted cross into the box from the free kick, but his effort is plucked out of the air by Thomas Kraft.
Valentin Stocker (Hertha Berlin) tackles a bit over zealously and Guido Winkmann blows for a foul. Dortmund get a free kick.
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) swings in a cross, but the ball is cleared to safety by one of the defending players.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) takes a short corner kick.

Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) jinks his way past multiple challenges and fires from the edge of the box to the middle of the goal, but Thomas Kraft is equal to it. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Dortmund.
Thomas Kraft displays his ability to read the game and clears the danger after Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) threatened to latch onto a through ball from just outside the box.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) launches the ball from the resulting corner, but one of the defenders is first to the ball and deals with the threat.
A cross from Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety. It will be a corner kick for Dortmund.
Shinji Kagawa (Dortmund) gets on the ball and beats an opponent, but his run is stopped by the referee Guido Winkmann who sees an offensive foul.
Valentin Stocker (Hertha Berlin) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Shinji Kagawa puts the ball on a plate for Mats Hummels (Dortmund), who has an easy finish with a header into an empty net. The score is 1:0.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Marco Reus (Dortmund) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
The resulting set piece from Marco Reus (Dortmund) is successfully intercepted by the defender. The referee blows his whistle, Dortmund are awarded a corner kick.
Guido Winkmann blows his whistle after Vladimir Darida (Hertha Berlin) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. Dortmund will take a free kick near the side line.
Julian Weigl (Dortmund) receives an accurate pass and attempts to threaten the goalkeeper with his long range strike. Unfortunately for him, his effort goes high above the crossbar.
Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) makes a slide tackle, but referee Guido Winkmann blows for a foul.
Vladimir Darida (Hertha Berlin) picks up the rebound on the edge of the box and shoots. His effort, however, only finds the gloves of the opponent's goalkeeper.
Johannes van den Bergh (Hertha Berlin) delivers a promising cross into the box, but it's cleared.
Marcel Schmelzer (Dortmund) with a wonderful solo effort. He blasted from long range, but the shot towards the bottom left corner was thwarted by Thomas Kraft.
Genki Haraguchi (Hertha Berlin) makes a run into the box in an attempt to get onto a long through ball, but one of the opponents comes up with a vital clearance.
Johannes van den Bergh (Hertha Berlin) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety.
Ilkay Gundogan (Dortmund) attempts to find one of his teammates, but puts far too much on the pass and the chance is gone.
John Brooks (Hertha Berlin) gives away a foul for a fierce tackle on an opponent.
One of the Dortmund players tripped an opponent and conceded a foul.
Valentin Stocker (Hertha Berlin) commits a foul and Guido Winkmann immediately signals a free kick.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) is adjudged offside.
Vladimir Darida (Hertha Berlin) attempts to slip the ball through the defence, but is unable to find any of his teammates.
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Dortmund) tries to create a chance, but puts too much weight on his pass.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has just begun.
